value.title: What are work or school, and Microsoft personal accounts? | One Dev Question: Jean-Marc Prieur
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Jean-Marc Prieur, a Principal Program Manager Program Manager working on the Microsoft identity platform, explains the difference between work and school accounts, and personal Microsoft accounts.   Get more information at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/E2OUluQQKSk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Implement a Data Streaming Solution with Azure Streaming Analytics
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Stream Analytics streaming data, the concepts of event processing, and integration of Internet of Things (IoT) devices.

topItems.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data.

topItems.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Introduction to version control with Git
value.excerpt: Git is the leading version control tool and essential for developers. Learn how to leverage Git to track your own changes and collaborate with others.

topItems.title: Introduction to Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Collaborate with Git
topItems.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

topItems.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
topItems.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesize text input to speech, perform speech translation, and implement speaker recognition in your AI infused applications

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy a multicontainer application to Kubernetes on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics
value.excerpt: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to evaluate Logic Apps as an automation choice for your organization using criteria for integration, performance, conditionals, and connectors.

value.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
value.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Compare the different APIs that are available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

value.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organization’s cloud adoption efforts

value.title: Cloud security
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Keeping your cloud secure means more than just adding permissions to resources. Learn about what cloud security means, including threats, cryptography, and regulation.

value.title: Share cloud resources
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Get an introduction to virtualization, one of the many technologies that power the cloud. Learn what virtualization is, its benefits, and how cloud resources are shared.

value.title: Collaborate with Git
value.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
value.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
value.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.
